english.segment1: Take this blindfold off of me. I'm walking but I cannot see. Mysteries fly at my feet. The answers come with no relief
english.segment2: Broken shoes won't get you far. Climb on my back I'll carry you afar. Words just feel anatheistized. But hope is found within the lies
english.segment3: And I keep walking down that road. And I keep running down that road
english.segment4: Take this blindfold off of me. I'm crawling, grabbing, breathing for the way I can see. Hold me, take me, run with me, I know you'll ignite. A battered flame that once was bright
english.segment5: And I keep walking down that road. And I keep running down that road
english.segment6: Glory, glory. Glory, in the highest
